creator: BILT Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Intelligent Instructions®

The BILT mobile app for Android features interactive, 3D step-by-step instructions for products requiring assembly, installation, set-up, repair, or maintenance. Easier than paper instructions (and more fun), BILT makes assembly straightforward, intuitive, and easy to understand.

BILT for smartphones and tablets features:

• An overview of the time, tools, parts, steps, & the number of people required for your project
• 3D instructions showing all the parts come together in an animation
• Interactivity including pinch to zoom, slide to rotate, & tap for more information
• Audio & text guidance with simple play/pause controls to help you through the process at your own pace
• Ability to save receipts electronically with the product details for easy access
• Quick product registration & warranty retrieval
• In-app product rating & review
descriptionShort: A new, intuitive way to assemble products with interactive 3D instructions.

title: BILT Intelligent Instructions®

creator: BILT Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Get projects done right the first time with easy-to-follow BILT instructions.


FEATURES
- Follow interactive 3D animation on each step
- Zoom in and out
- Rotate 3D images for a better angle
- Tap on any part for details
- Choose optional voice narration & text guides
- Skip ahead, go back, or replay a step instantly
- Be confident with official, up-to-date, brand-approved guides
- Download instructions ahead to use without WiFi


BENEFITS
- Easier to understand than paper or video
- Reduces paper waste
- Confidence you did it right the first time

Whether it’s for assembly, installation, maintenance, or repair, BILT instructions are a revolutionary new way to set up products efficiently.


WHY IS BILT FREE?
